data.eml:eml: A new species of Urophora Robineau-Desvoidiy, 1830 (Diptera, Tephritidae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Namin, Saeed Mohamadzade, Nozari, Jamasb (2011): A new species of Urophora Robineau-Desvoidiy, 1830 (Diptera, Tephritidae) from Iran. ZooKeys 152: 63-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.152.1911, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.152.1911
